pkgmetadata.longdescription: Schloss Lab Tools for Reproducible Microbiome Research // A collection of useful functions and example code created and used by the Schloss Lab for reproducible microbiome research. Perform common tasks like read files created by mothur https://mothur.org/, tidy up your microbiome data, and format R Markdown documents for publication. See the website http://www.schlosslab.org/schtools/ for more information, documentation, and examples.
